description: Try our easy to follow Battered Tofu With Veggie Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Entrees,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Tofu,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Battered Tofu With Veggie Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour into a bowl. Add margarine and soda water. Whisk to a smooth batter. Set aside.

Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line a baking tray with paper towel. Half fill a medium saucepan with oil and place over medium heat. When hot, cook sliced vegetables, in batches, for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Drain on prepared tray. Keep warm in oven.

Cut tofu into 12 slices. Cut each nori sheet into 4 strips. Wrap a nori strip around each tofu slice. Pat dry with paper towel. Lightly coat slices with flour, then dip into batter. Carefully lower into hot oil, in batches and cook for 3-4 minutes or until golden. Drain on paper towel. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with veggie chips.
